title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 August 2012 - XWiki
content:

06:09 <CIA-114> Caleb James DeLisle feature-attachment-outputstream \* rf1bdd33 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f1bdd33ee3d6f069699fd2405b77c996f668268c / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8121: XWikiAttachmentContent should have a way to set the content by writing to a provided OutputStream. - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f1bdd33ee3d6f069699fd2405b77c996f668268c  
06:10 <@cjd> pushed a branch so you can look at the code, I didn't think of doing a PR but I suppose that's the normal route  
06:12 <@cjd> I didn't think to mention in my reply that it really doesn't have a lot todo with the transaction level, it doesn't touch hibernate, it's just another way to feed data into the FileItem and mark the XAC as dirty
